title: SOLD: 1906 Red Sox W601 Sporting Life postcard Boston AL, Cy Young & Jimmy Collins
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1906 Red Sox W601 Sporting Life postcard Boston AL, Cy Young & Jimmy Collins
posts.post_content:
For sale here is a 1906-7 W601 Sporting Life postcard depicting the Boston Red Sox squad of the American League.

Depicted are 2 HOFers, the venerable Cy Young, who seems to be on a tear as of late, and also Jimmy Collins.

A challenging postcard to find and one for the discerning Red Sox collector.  Available here, tax free :rolleyes:, for $SOLD postpaid, net to me, in the U.S.

Commitment to purchase outweighs an ongoing negotiations.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
Some interesting information about Sheriff H. (Hugh) B. Campbell.........
Thanks for posting that article Tim.  It's cool what kind of history accompanies these surviving pieces and you unearthed some of it right there.  :)
